modules.name: com.iskaald.foundation
modules.description: Base systems and utilities for Unity projects.

modules.name: com.iskaald.ui
modules.description: Provides a centralized system for registering, opening, and managing UI windows. Includes base classes and interfaces for building modular and extensible UI components.

modules.name: com.iskaald.monobehaviourhost
modules.description: Provides a centralized system for creating, managing, and executing MonoBehaviour components, enabling non-MonoBehaviour classes to utilize Unity's update loop and coroutines.

modules.name: com.iskaald.network
modules.description: A network service for Unity that manages HTTP requests and provides a built-in request queue and handler.

modules.name: com.iskaald.saveservice
modules.description: A flexible save service for Unity that manages properties of any type and supports saving to PlayerPrefs, files, or custom destinations using JSON serialization.
